titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony and production of documents by Senate employees in an Unemployment Compensation appeals matter.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/30/1987--Introduced. Authorizes Linda C. Takayama, Jay C. Woodall, and any other Senate employee who may be requested to testify and produce documents relevant to the unemployment compensation claim of Charles K. Carrothers, except concerning matters which may be privileged.
